title: How to Make Glazed Beans

steps.headline: Prepare the beans.
steps.description: Trim the beans after washing them.

steps.headline: Cook the beans.
steps.description: Either microwave, steam or boil the beans until just tender. They should still look bright green in color. Drain of any excess liquid.

steps.headline: Add the butter or oil, lemon rind, lemon juice and honey or maple syrup to a small saucepan.
steps.description: Heat gently until the butter melts (or, if using oil, the mixture has blended well).

steps.headline: Add the beans to the liquid mixture.

text: Prepare the beans. Trim the beans after washing them. Cook the beans. Either microwave, steam or boil the beans until just tender. They should still look bright green in color. Drain of any excess liquid. Add the butter or oil, lemon rind, lemon juice and honey or maple syrup to a small saucepan. Heat gently until the butter melts (or, if using oil, the mixture has blended well). Add the beans to the liquid mixture. Cook over low heat for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. As you stir, keep coating the beans well with the mixture. Serve immediately.
